episodes.title: Salvation only for Jehovah's Witnesses
episodes.description:
Watchtower quotes that billions of people will be killed at Armageddon, with only the several million Jehovah's Witnesses having any hope of survival. This discussion includes a look at the historical development of this appalling doctrine and why it is unfounded. 

The transcript of this recording, including all data, graphs and charts is at https://jwfacts.com/watchtower/salvation-only-for-jehovahs-witnesses.php

Please do not use my channel as your personal soap box to push a religious agenda, Watchtower or otherwise. Whilst I am happy to receive comments, I will remove any not directly related to the video, as I will not tolerate religious trolls or spammers.

episodes.title: Reading JWfacts emails with Zac and Paul Grundy - part 1
episodes.description:
My 9 year old son and I reading emails that I receive at JWfacts.com. I read the ones from people expressing deep gratitude for the positive influence the information has had on their life. Zac is reading the abusive ones sent by Jehovah's Witnesses, usually suggesting the information is all lies, or that they cannot wait for Jehovah to destroy me at Armageddon. 

The transcript of this recording, is at the article Comments from Readers as displayed at https://www.jwfacts.com/watchtower/emails-from-readers.php.

Please do not use my channel as your personal soap box to push a religious agenda, Watchtower or otherwise. Whilst I am happy to receive comments, I will remove any not directly related to the video, as I will not tolerate religious trolls or spammers.

episodes.title: Detailed analysis of Jehovah's Witness statistics from Watchtower reports.
episodes.description:
Using Watchtower's annual publisher reports spanning back to the 1960's, growth rates are analysed and compared, showing a steady decline in growth.

There have been a few comments offended that I described faders as volatile. I am sorry for any unintended implied insult. I actually recommend fading and commend people that see the religion is not the truth and have the strength to fade. I was referring to a small group that have not determined if it is the truth or not, become inactive, and then go rushing back each time there is a calamity, in fear that maybe Armageddon be coming.

The transcript of this recording, including all data, graphs and charts is at https://www.jwfacts.com/watchtower/statistics.php.

Please do not use my channel as your personal soap box to push a religious agenda, Watchtower or otherwise. Whilst I am happy to receive comments, I will remove any not directly related to the video, as I will not tolerate religious trolls or spammers.

episodes.title: Paul Grundy - Author of jwfacts.com - My Story
episodes.description:
I am the author of jwfacts.com, and this is the story of my experience going from "full time servant" as one of Jehovah's Witnesses, to running one of the most influential websites assisting people leave the Watchtower organisation. 

------
Thank you for all the comments of appreciation. There are too many to reply to you all, but I do read them and am moved by hearing that jwfacts.com has helped so many people.
------

The transcript of this recording is at http://jwfacts.com/watchtower/experiences/paul-grundy.php

Please do not use my channel as your personal soap box to push a religious agenda, Watchtower or otherwise. Whilst I am happy to receive comments, I will remove any not directly related to the video, as I will not tolerate religious trolls or spammers.

episodes.title: The Increasing Number of Jehovah's Witness Memorial Partakers
episodes.description:
For 70 years, Watchtower doctrine dictated that the heavenly calling closed in 1935. After the Governing Body admitted in 2007 that there was no basis for such doctrine, the number of memorial partakers has steadily risen. Can the current stance be trusted any more than the previous one? For the article this video is based on, see https://www.jwfacts.com/watchtower/memorial-partakers.php

Please do not use my channel as your personal soap box to push a religious agenda, Watchtower or otherwise. Whilst I am happy to receive comments, I will remove any not directly related to the video, as I will not tolerate religious trolls or spammers.

episodes.title: 1925 Million's Now Living Will Never Die! - jw.org
episodes.description:
JWFacts discusses Jehovah's Witnesses (jw.org) early teaching that 1925 would see the commencement of the earthly resurrection, along with the slogan "Million's now Living Will Never Die!" Included are quotes and images from early Watchtower publications. For the article that this video is based on see http://www.jwfacts.com/watchtower/1925.php

Please do not use my channel as your personal soap box to push a religious agenda, Watchtower or otherwise. Whilst I am happy to receive comments, I will remove any not directly related to the video, as I will not tolerate religious trolls or spammers.
